diseases.name: Influenza
symptoms: Severe body aches and muscle pain
Shortness of breath or chest discomfort
precautions: Get vaccinated annually
Wash hands frequently with soap and water
Avoid close contact with sick individuals
Cover your mouth and nose with a tissue or elbow when sneezing or coughing
Stay home when feeling unwell
daily_health_routine: Maintain a balanced diet rich in vitamins (especially A and C) and minerals (such as zinc)
Engage in moderate-intensity exercise for at least 30 minutes
Ensure a minimum of 7-8 hours of quality sleep each night
Stay well-hydrated by drinking at least 8 glasses of water daily
Manage stress through relaxation techniques or hobbies
Practice good respiratory hygiene, including regular ventilation of living spaces
Consider immune-boosting supplements as advised by healthcare professionals

Stay hydrated with warm fluids like herbal teas and broths

Maintain good personal hygiene to prevent the spread of viruses
Include regular handwashing as part of your routine
Practice stress-reducing activities, such as meditation or yoga
Ensure a daily intake of probiotics to support the immune system
Stay physically active with light exercises like walking or stretching
Stay well-hydrated to help flush out toxins from the body

Use mild, fragrance-free soaps and detergents

Wear loose-fitting, breathable clothing

Take short, lukewarm baths with mild soap
Use a humidifier to maintain skin hydration, especially during dry weather
Wear soft, breathable fabrics like cotton
Practice stress-management techniques to reduce flare-ups
Avoid sudden changes in temperature or humidity
Consult a dermatologist for personalized skincare recommendations
